content: The Military Budget For the first time, the Pentagon wants more money for Afghanistan than for Iraq and shifts priorities from expensive weapons systems to help for the warfighter. Defense budget overview ARMY: Full force, fewer incentives, a pivot toward Afghanistan >>>http://www.stripes.com/article.asp?section=104&article=62569 AIR FORCE: Little money, no F-22 Raptors >>>http://www.stripes.com/article.asp?section=104&article=62580 NAVY: Taking steps to move toward irregular warfare >>>http://www.stripes.com/article.asp?section=104&article=62570 USMC: Focused on ‘overseas contingency operations’ >>>http://www.stripes.com/article.asp?section=104&article=62578 Looks like there will be some major changes coming down the pipeline.
